name: Little Tanks (HolyMan1112)
description:
This is a simple singleplayer diep.io clone, that was made on Construct 2. Your main goal is to survive as long as possible, and get higher score!

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move;
  • Mouse to aim and shoot.
  • Press F4 to toggle fullscreen.

Destroy enemies or polygons to get XP

Game may lag or have some bugs.

Good luck!
